author: Brittany McHatten
title: Sandollar Spa and Pool prepares for move to Bangor - NewsBreak
text:
By Brittany McHatten ,
3 hours ago BANGOR, Maine (WABI) - The recent cold temps have us dreaming of warmer days ahead, when heading out back to the pool will bring welcome relief from the Maine summer. In 2025, Sandollar Spa and Pool is celebrating 40 years of helping Mainers with their backyard leisure needs. They have big things planned for their anniversary, including a move across the bridge from their current location in Brewer. Read full article
Read in NewsBreak

author: Australian National Review
title: Number of Family Doctors in Canada on Decline Over Last 10 Years
text:
The number of new family doctors providing care in Canada has slowed over the past decade, according to a new report.
The annual report from the Canadian Institute for Health Information (CIHI), examines trends among health-care professionals offering primary care services. The growth of doctors entering the field has slowed from 3 percent between 2015 and 2017 to one percent between 2021 and 2023, the report released Dec. 17 found. The drop in family doctors occurred at the same time as a rapid increase in Canada’s population, CIHI said.
CIHI also noted that physicians have been seeing fewer patients than they did 10 years ago. There could be multiple reasons for this, including an aging and complex patient population that requires more time per visit, the expansion of the role of nurse practitioners and pharmacists, and the need for work-life balance, the institute said.
“On average, there has been an 18 percent decline over the past 10 years—from 1,746 patients in 2013 to 1,430 patients in 2022,” CIHI said in a Dec. 17 press release . An earlier report from CIHI noted that 5.4 million Canadians 18 and older say they didn’t have access to a regular health-care provider in 2023. Related Stories
Additionally, Canada ranked last in a survey of 10 Commonwealth countries for the number of people who said they have a doctor or place to go for medical care. “Of Canadians without a regular primary care provider, 39 percent reported having at least one chronic condition, and 29 percent took one or more prescription medications,” CIHI said in a March press release .
“Better access to primary health care can lead to better health outcomes, and to fewer emergency department (ED) visits and hospitalizations.”
More Health Care Professionals While the number of doctors is declining, there has been growth in the number of other health-care professionals, according to CIHI.
“Overall health workforce delivering care in Canada’s communities—that is, outside of hospitals and long-term care homes, for example—is, in fact, growing,” the organization said.
The report notes there was a growth in the number of pharmacists, nurses, and physiotherapists working in community settings in 2023.
The past decade has seen a 15 percentage point increase in the proportion of physiotherapists working in community settings, according to the press release. That is the largest growth of all professionals.
Approximately three-quarters of pharmacists are working in community settings, CIHI said.
The organization also found a 3 percent increase in the number of nurse practitioners over the past 10 years. It said nearly 37,000 registered nurses and just shy of 19,000 licensed practical nurses worked in community care settings.
Source link

author: @infobae
title: El ERE en GE Vernova se cierra con 118 despidos, 47 menos de los previstos inicialmente - Infobae
text:
Barcelona, 29 nov (EFECOM).- La dirección de GE Vernova y el comité de empresa han acordado que el expediente de regulación de empleo (ERE) que negociaban afecte finalmente a 118 personas, frente a las 165 inicialmente planteadas y de las que más del 90 % pertenecían al centro que la multinacional tiene en Barcelona.
El acuerdo ha sido posteriormente ratificado por una "amplísima mayoría" de la plantilla, ha informado CCOO de Catalunya en un comunicado.
El ERE afectaba inicialmente a un 50 % de los 320 empleados que GE Vernova tiene en Barcelona, y a una decena más de trabajadores ubicados en Madrid.
El centro de trabajo de GE Vernova situado en el barrio de Poblenou de Barcelona proviene de la antigua Alstom Wind, que luego fue adquirida por General Electric. Finalmente, el gigante estadounidense se dividió en tres compañías independientes en bolsa y el negocio de energía se concentró en GE Vernova.
GE Vernova comunicó recientemente una reestructuración en el negocio de eólica marina para eliminar 900 empleos, 750 de ellos en Europa.
Según CCOO, el acuerdo prevé crear 14 puestos de trabajo en la planta de Barcelona, por lo que si el perfil solicitado encajara se podría reducir en esa proporción la cifra de despedidos por el ERE.
Ambas partes han pactado indemnizaciones de 45 días por año trabajado, con un tope de 24 mensualidades y una cantidad máxima de hasta 180.000 euros.
Las personas con menos de dos años en la empresa recibirán un mínimo de 8.000 euros y de 20.000 euros a partir de dos años de antigüedad.
También se ha pactado una cantidad lineal de 800 euros al año, con un máximo de 9.000 en caso de ser menores de 50 años, y de hasta 15.000 a partir de esa edad.
También se ha consensuado un plan de rentas para las personas que tengan a partir de 57 años, con un tope de hasta el 70 % del salario, un porcentaje que será de hasta el 80 % para las personas de entre 60 y 62 años. EFECOM

author: PTI
title: Priyanka Gandhi Urges Swift Action for Assam Flood Relief | Law-Order
text: Priyanka Gandhi Urges Swift Action for Assam Flood Relief Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi Vadra has called for expedited relief efforts and compensation for flood-affected people in Assam. The state faces severe flooding, impacting over four lakh individuals across multiple districts. Major rivers are above danger levels, and the death toll has reached 36. [PTI](/pti-stories)| New Delhi | Updated: 21-06-2024 17:17 IST | Created: 21-06-2024 17:17 IST - Country: - India In a strong appeal for urgent action, Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi Vadra urged the Assam government to expedite relief and rescue operations for the flood-hit regions. She also stressed the need for compensation to families of the deceased. Officials reported on Friday that the flood situation in Assam remains dire, with more than four lakh people affected in various districts. Rivers like Kopili, Barak, and Kushiyara are surpassing danger levels. Gandhi's plea came in a Hindi post on X, where she noted the devastation and loss of life, urging both the state government and Congress members to assist those impacted. The relentless rains have intensified the crisis, with the state's death toll from floods, landslides, and storms now at 36. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)

author: agi
title: Egocentrici e narcisisti si sentono più emarginati
text:
AGI - Le persone narcisiste corrono un rischio più elevato di sentirsi emarginate rispetto ai coetanei meno egocentrici. Questo curioso risultato emerge da uno studio, pubblicato sul Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, condotto dagli scienziati dell'Università di Basilea. Il team, guidato da Christiane Buttner, ha analizzato i dati del German Socio-Economic Panel, un sondaggio nazionale rappresentativo a lungo termine di circa 22mila nuclei familiari in Germania. Nell'ambito dell'indagine, gli scienziati si sono concentrati su 1.592 individui che nel 2015 hanno risposto a domande su narcisismo e ostracismo. Secondo le risposte considerate, la sensazione di essere esclusi potrebbe derivare dalla personalita' e dalla tendenza a interpretare male i segnali sociali ambigui delle persone caratterizzate da una visione centrale del se'.
"Sentirsi emarginati - afferma Buttner - è un'esperienza soggettiva basata sulla percezione di segnali sociali da parte dell'individuo. Alcuni possono essere intenzionalmente emarginati, mentre altri possono semplicemente male interpretare alcuni segnali sociali. I nostri risultati suggeriscono che gli individui con livelli più elevati di narcisismo sono più sensibili ai segnali di esclusione, il che li porta a percepire l'ostracismo più frequentemente".
Per confermare i risultati preliminari, i ricercatori hanno raccolto i dati di 323 partecipanti, che hanno completato valutazioni su narcisismo e percezione di ostracismo. Nell'arco di tempo di 14 giorni, i volontari sono stati monitorati attraverso un'app mobile. "I partecipanti con punteggi più alti di narcisismo - riporta Buttner - riferivano di sentirsi esclusi più frequentemente rispetto alle controparti meno egocentriche". Il gruppo di ricerca ha anche riportato i risultati di un ulteriore esperimento, nell'ambito del quale sono stati coinvolti 2.500 partecipanti. Alcuni si sono impegnati in un gioco virtuale che prevedeva passaggi di una palla. Mentre ad altri sono stati presentati scenari ipotetici in cui gli individui dovevano valutare il livello di esclusione che percepivano.
Da ultimo, gli scienziati hanno analizzato un database elaborato in 14 anni su oltre 72 mila partecipanti. Anche in questi casi, i dati hanno evidenziato la complessa interazione tra tratti della personalità ed esperienze sociali. Comprendere queste dinamiche, commentano gli scienziati, può aiutare ad affrontare meglio i conflitti sul posto di lavoro, l'isolamento sociale e persino questioni sociali più ampie. "Sapere che le persone con tratti narcisistici elevati hanno maggiori probabilità di sentirsi ed essere escluse - conclude Buttner - potrebbe aiutarci a valutare le tensioni nei luoghi di lavoro e nei gruppi sociali. Il nostro lavoro suggerisce che gli interventi volti a migliorare le relazioni interpersonali e a ridurre l'attrito sociale dovrebbero considerare sia le percezioni che i comportamenti degli individui coinvolti".

author: Mazepin
title: #130 Catalá, alcaldesa de Valencia (PP): "Si pongo la bandera del Orgullo, también pongo la del Alzheimer o el cáncer"
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#4](c4#c-4) Podria haber dicho:
- Racismo
- Xenofobia
- Igualdad de la mujer
- Explotacion infantil
- ...
Pero ha dicho enfermedades.
Eso es un hecho, y es irrefutable.
[#4](c4#c-4) No insistas. Es obvio que buscan precisamente eso al poner la bandera. Pero aqui siempre justifican la idiotez si es de izquierdas.
[#82](c82#c-82) los medios de ultraizquierda JAJAJAJJA. Dime qué medios son esos?
Y qué cara tienes de hablar de inclinación de la violencia de la izquierda en un país que sufrido una dictadura criminal de derechas durante cuarenta años.
[#24](c24#c-24) Claro, porque colgar una bandera supone un esfuerzo sobrehumano y un despilfarro de dinero público intolerable.
[#86](c86#c-86) tambien de la wiki BAIZUO
Se usa para degradar a quienes apoyan el bienestar animal, el ambientalismo, la igualdad corporal, la igualdad racial, LGBT, el feminismo, el vegetarianismo y la inmigración, es decir, izquierdistas, demócratas y liberales en el mundo blanco de Europa y América
Es un termino claramente peyorativo y, claramente, no es "ejemplo de" ni valida absolutamente nada.
Y muchos menos, ciertos pensamientos retrógrados
[#4](c4#c-4) Lo podías defender bien, pero has desaprovechado la ocasión por culpa "del ansia viva". En el vídeo indica que existen unos paneles que son los que se utilizan para todas las ocasiones, incluyendo el orgullo, en vez de utilizar banderas de plástico. Tampoco parece que vayas muy sobrado de comprensión.
[#87](c87#c-87) Bueno quizá eran mas que el 50%. Pero se entiende.
Queremos los votos de gays, pero por otro lado queremos hacer un guiño a nuestro votante homófobo para que vea que en realidad estamos con ellos. Así que mejor no nos pronunciamos en ningún sentido para tener cuantos mas votos posibles.
[#73](c73#c-73) Vale, ponle que se han tergiversado sus palabras. Que problema hay con poner la bandera del arco iris durante el orgullo y la del cancer el día de la lucha contra el cancer?
[#102](c102#c-102) Vete a [#2](c2#c-2) y vete a [#4](c4#c-4).
Yo lo que digo es que el que interprete que está "mezclando la homosexualidad con enfermedades" y me quiera convencer está siendo falaz y deshonesto. Vamos, que si lo dijera alguien de su partido también lo entendería, pero no lo atacaría.
¿Entendemos que mezclar y poner al mismo nivel dos temas equiparandolos no es lo mismo que mezclar diferentes palabras en una frase, verdad? Temas/Palabras.
Todos tranquilos, que para criticar sl PP sobran envíos con mas peso. Este es más onda"es burdo, pero vamos adelante"
[#97](c97#c-97) Y a mi me gusta el pan con pasas y nueces.
Lo que no ha hecho es comparar ser LGTB con estar enfermo. Ahora?
[#5](c5#c-5) Una bandera reivindicativa debería de usarse SIEMPRE, no cuando "toque" porque lo dicta el calendario... Sacarla ahora solo demuestra un postureo asqueroso. Se está transformando una lucha social que costó años, que costó vidas y que costó sangre y sudor para llegar a donde se ha llegado en una puta fiesta patrocinada por Coca Cola y Apple.
Respecto a las declaraciones de esta señora... Desafortunado el sacar la enfermedad para exponer su argumento pero se ve claramente que no dice que la homosexualidad sea una enfermedad.
"Si pongo la bandera del Orgullo también pongo la del Alzheimer, el ELA, el cáncer y todas las banderas y necesidades sociales".
Y como dijeron por arriba, espero que sea consecuente empiece a pedir que a sus mítines y eventos de partido se vaya con la bandera del PP y no con la de todos los españoles.
Me parece muy mal, el cáncer se puede curar en muchos casos.
Y el Alzheimer igual en un futuro.
Lo que no entiendo es considerar la impotencia, que no te permite reproducirte por medios tradicionales, un problema médico. O la esterilidad.
[#33](c33#c-33) Pues como cuando hablan de comunistas, hasta perro sanxez les parece un peligroso sociocomunista. O llamar a podemos ultra izquierda
Pero esto es inverosimil... no puede haber dicho eso, lo entenderiais mal... querria decir, soy reaccinaria, lo sabeis y me votasteis, pues ahi teneis, ah y rica, vamos que tengo tiempo pa ir a misa.
Buff, acabo de escucharlo, está pallá,, insiste en lo de las enfermedades, como si hubiese que reivindicarlas, o fuesen conquistas sociales, como es evidente que esto no puede ser, ergo ha de ser lo otro, que lo compara con taras o enfermedades... no me lo creia... no pone ninguna bandera y ya está, no se si existen banderas del cancer o del ELA,, dios mio... dios mio de mi vida. Estos tipos de donde maman,,, a que lo sabeis. Si no dicen lo que es facil decir es que no quieren decirlo, y es por algo.

title: Microsoft to force-install New Outlook on Windows 10, shares PowerShell/Registry workaround
text:
Microsoft at the moment is having a difficult time moving users over to new products. First, it is trying people to get on Windows 11 from Windows 10 the latter of which is reaching [end-of-support status this year](https://www.neowin.net/news/dell-amd-give-a-reason-why-microsoft-officially-recommends-a-new-pc-to-update-to-windows-11/) quashing recent rumors of [system requirements relaxation](https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-confirms-its-not-lowering-windows-11-system-requirements-for-unsupported-hardware/).
Second, the tech giant is also trying to make people like its New Outlook for Windows app. It recently announced that Microsoft 365 (M365) Enterprise users will be migrated to [New Outlook in April 2026](https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-365-enterprise-users-to-be-automatically-switched-to-new-outlook-in-april-2026/).
Following that, the company today announced that the New Outlook for Windows app will be automatically installed on Windows 10 devices as well, like it has been [doing on Windows 11](https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-might-automatically-install-the-new-outlook-on-your-windows-11-23h2-pc/). Microsoft published the message on the Microsoft 365 Admin Center under message ID MC976059 where it has added details about the development.
It says:
New Outlook for Windows will be automatically installed on Windows 10 devices as part of an upcoming monthly security release.
[When this will happen:]
Available as part of:
- the optional Windows 10 release on January 28, 2025.
- the monthly security update release for Windows 10 on February 11, 2025.
[How this affects your organization:]
New Outlook exists as an installed app on the device. For instance, it can be found in the Apps section of the Start Menu. It does not replace existing (classic) Outlook or change any configurations / user defaults. Both (classic) Outlook and New Outlook for Windows can run side by side.
Thus the New Outlook for Windows app will be initially installed on Windows 10 systems opting for the optional C release for this month and the wider rollout to all devices will be happening next month via February Patch Tuesday (B-release).
As mentioned above, Microsoft is trying hard to win hearts. The company is adding much-needed features to the app like [PST support](https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-adding-pst-features-support-to-new-outlook-for-windows-and-mac-in-early-2025/) as well as [better offline features](https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-improving-new-outlook-for-windows-offline-mode-again-with-a-new-feature/).
All is not bad though as Microsoft has also issued guidance on how to uninstall it using PowerShell and Registry workaround. You can [find it here](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-apps/outlook/get-started/control-install#block-new-outlook-preinstall-on-windows) on Microsoft's official site.

author: world today news
title: Bethlehem Christmas celebrations muted by war in Gaza - World Today News
text: (CNN) – Church bells echo through the maze-like streets of Bethlehem. With Christmas approaching, the city in the Israeli-occupied West Bank was supposed to be crowded with visitors, but it has become almost deserted this year. Local leaders took a decision last month to reduce celebrations in solidarity with the Palestinian population, as violent fighting intensified between Israel and Hamas in the devastated Gaza Strip. More than 20,000 Palestinians were killed during the Israeli air and ground offensive, according to the Hamas-controlled Ministry of Health in Gaza, and nearly 85% of the Strip’s total population was displaced. The war was sparked by the October 7 Hamas terrorist attack on southern Israel in which at least 1,200 people were killed and more than 240 others were taken hostage. Many here have connections to Gaza through loved ones and friends, and a sense of misery has gripped the city revered by Christians as the birthplace of Jesus Christ. The decorations that once adorned the neighborhoods have been removed. Religious parades and celebrations were also cancelled. In the city centre, the huge traditional Christmas tree in Manger Square was clearly absent. Since last October 7, Israel has imposed movement restrictions in Bethlehem and other Palestinian cities in the West Bank, with military checkpoints allowing entry and exit, affecting Palestinians trying to get to work. The occupied territories also witnessed an escalation in violence, with at least 300 Palestinians killed in Israeli attacks, according to the Palestinian Ministry of Health . Ali Thabet told CNN: “My son asked me why there is no Christmas tree this year, and I don’t know how to explain it.” Read more: Germany Leases Drones to Israel for Counter-Attacks on Hamas, says Defense Source - CNN Indonesia He and his family live in a nearby Palestinian village, and they visit Bethlehem every Christmas “because our relationship with our Christian brothers is strong. We join them in their celebrations, and they also join us in our celebrations. But the holiday season this year is very bad.” Walking along the cobblestone streets, the impact of the conflict is clearly visible. Bethlehem’s economy depends on pilgrims and tourism, explains third-generation shop owner Roni Tabash, who stands outside his store waiting for customers who will never arrive. Tabash brings his father with him to the store every day to get him out of the house. His grandfather opened the store in 1927, explaining that this place, along with the square and its famous church, had become “part of our hearts.” He adds: “We have never seen a Christmas like this before. In three months, frankly, we have not made a single sale. I don’t want to keep my father at home, and I don’t want to give up hope.” Even the Church of the Nativity, which became the first World Heritage Site in the Palestinian territories in 2012, is largely empty. In a normal year, queues of hundreds line up around the parking lot outside and pilgrims wait patiently to enter the cave, which since the 2nd century has been considered the exact site of Christ’s birth. In the 4th century AD, Emperor Constantine founded a church on the site, which was destroyed in 529, to be replaced by larger buildings, which form the basis of the church today. Read more: In 45 seconds .. a gang steals jewelry worth 2 million dollars in the middle of New York .. Video Inside, it’s usually standing room only. But this year, the fighting in Gaza changed everything. Father Spyridon Sammour, the Greek Orthodox priest in the Church of the Nativity, says: “I have never seen this before.” He added: “Christmas is joy, love and peace. We do not have peace.” He added: “We have no joy, it is out of our hands, and we call on the leaders who will make the decisions (all over the world ) to God to help them, and to give them His light to make peace here and in the world .” the whole world ”. #war #rages #Gaza #Christmas #celebrations #effectively #canceled #Bethlehem 2023-12-24 09:45:57
